div.p: I’m quite content, I’m quite content where I am, I’ve got nothing going on except finding time to do my pilot’s licence and keeping myself healthy and fit
I still live with my mum and dad but yeah, yeah they’re still being supportive, still give me a kick up the bum when I need it, yeah gone are the days
when I used to go out socialising and getting tipsy or whatever, getting into arguments, yeah I keep fit and train for my pilot’s licence.
